html:
10.29.18  1:34 pm   can u give me a reason to live

     could be fun, and along the way you will surely discover what the world is made of

10.29.18  12:43 pm   How to fix chronic pain

     chronic pleasure

10.29.18  12:15 pm   have you ever noticed the off-by-one errors that are everywhere in music? for example, a third plus a third is a fifth, a fifth plus a fifth is a ninth etc. as a math person this always bugged me. "thirds" should be called "seconds", "fifths" should be called "fourths", etc.

     that wouldn't be quite right either, ... a fourth plus a fourth is a half

10.29.18  12:11 pm   why make music at all?

     could be fun, and along the way you will surely discover what the world is made of

10.29.18  11:01 am   If you had to choose a musical style other than your current one what would it be?

     i already have an open door policy. the question is do i have the wheel power to get there

10.29.18  9:40 am   why doesn't hello sexy pants get the appreciation it deserves

     because the first 3 seconds weren't good enough

10.29.18  8:39 am   what does it mean to be human?

     that moment when you accidentally get too inventive and end up risking it all

10.29.18  8:38 am   do you enjoy pencils or pens?

     sure

10.29.18  6:35 am   what time do you start working on your stuff every day

     as soon as possible

10.29.18  4:51 am   what is the key to happiness ?

     being sad for a little while

10.29.18  4:09 am   are you secretly donald trump

     yes oops not anymore

10.29.18  3:42 am   how do i get better at publishing things without taking months to make them perfect?

     you need to get on some sort of unstoppable train. take a moment to figure out what your dream train is, and i think you'll find that as soon as you have envisioned it it will be leaving the station

10.29.18  3:21 am   Is there a continuing storyline through your music videos?

     i'll do it til i die

     I have an uncomplicated theory I'd love to share.

10.29.18  3:21 am   which chord is the best one

     F

10.29.18  3:11 am   If you got the chance to travel to any spot outside Earth, where do you wish to go?

     not safe enough yet, sorry

10.29.18  2:44 am   You have some amazing percussion  and rytmic sounds in your songs, how do you come up with all the parts for them??

     for me that's probably the easiest part. common sense

10.29.18  1:19 am   whats your process for creating songs? alternatively, when do owls sleep?

     one day i will teach it in depth but today's tip of the day is always do timed run throughs from the beginning, and i like to do a 'door touch' to do a simulated reset

10.29.18  1:16 am   What is your favorite thing to do besides making music?

     making videos, and writing textual content

10.29.18  12:43 am   I'm making a video about you for a school project. How would you describe your art?

     simply go to billwurtz dot com

10.28.18  10:52 pm   I and many others want to view the world through your eyes. With that being said, how would you summarize it in general? 

      there must be 100 ways .....

10.28.18  10:42 pm   why is bad art good?

     that would make for an interesting plot twist

10.28.18  9:54 pm   what's the most important thing you did today?

     the bouncing vehicle

10.28.18  9:09 pm   I recently got a job at a restaurant and I feel like I've just been doing everything wrong, and I'm super self-conscious about it. I feel like everyone thinks I'm an idiot. Any advice? 

     take a moment to notice all the other idiots in the world, other than you. even the playing field a bit

10.28.18  8:18 pm   is life without music a mistake?

     music is made out of mistakes

10.28.18  7:53 pm   How will your 2 week schedule change around the holidays?

     not at all

10.28.18  7:51 pm   Hearing from you that some people say the key changes in "the moon is made of cheese" were too much makes me sad. They're the reason that song is my favorite. Will you do less key changes in the future because of that? Your skill in changing keys is unparalleled and I'd be sad to see it being held back.

     i will continue with my usual adventurousness, but i will add 1 single grain of salt

10.28.18  7:32 pm   what are you going to be for halloween?

     12 bar blues, actually more like 6 bar blues, with 4 on the floor around 90bpm

10.28.18  7:18 pm   i really like the beat of 'in california'. will you do another song that sounds like that?

     yes

10.28.18  7:02 pm   do you have a serious answer for your favorite movie?

     every time i pick a favorite, another one becomes better

10.28.18  5:49 pm   just a head up, lots of different ideas out there about how things work

     that's what makes this entire world possible

10.28.18  5:25 pm   why do the same chords have different chord symbols? do they get written differently if they are in a different key?

     sometimes different people write them a little differently. it's nearly impossible to sum up exactly which notes to play, and how to play them, in 1 chord symbol, so you have to usually leave some information out somehow. so you may choose to leave out different information than someone else

10.28.18  4:13 pm   Do you like playing monopoly?

     it's more thrilling in real life

10.28.18  2:04 pm   Can u think of any songs with a key change that goes down a half step (like from C maj to B maj)

     lenny kravitz american woman, guitar solo

10.28.18  1:53 pm   how do i start using more complicated and exciting chords? how do i find out how to help them?? music is confusing

     first you must pinpoint the reason you think you want more complicated chords. did you hear a chord recently that you thought was complicated that you really liked? you must figure out what is driving you to seek complicated chords, and find the chords you heard in those moments. just figure out what those ones are

10.28.18  1:49 pm   To be or not to be, and why or why not?

     surely you can try both at some point. in order to see what your options are

10.28.18  1:10 pm   What should I do about a really sore and stiff back dr. bill?

     sounds like you need to watch some Bob Schrupp and Brad Heineck videos

10.28.18  11:27 am   If brain transplants ever become possible then, one day, people will probably be able to go into a shop with lots of different bodies and choose the one they want, then an operation would be done to move their brain into that new body. You could even rent different bodies for different occasions or even become a robot maybe. What do you think of this?

     that is only scratching the surface

10.28.18  9:49 am   cars;good, or bad? 

     they are off to a good start

10.28.18  7:28 am   How do you feel about songs that have certain sounds only come out of one head phone

     most headphones nowadays are setup so that that will never quite happen

10.28.18  7:23 am   what is your approach to mixing a song??

     turn up the volume!!!! no just kidding, there are a lot of things to talk about here, and i wish i could talk about them all. i will probably teach a class at some point, but i still don't know most things

10.28.18  5:11 am   i'm sending you a post card from pyongyang 

     some how i don't believe you

10.28.18  3:48 am   Which song has four words in it

     happy birthday to you

10.28.18  2:01 am   how to name chords with Roman numerals??

     instead of the letters you say numbers. so in the key of C, C is 1. D is 2. but for an extra twist instead of regular numbers you use roman numerals instead. why, i don't know, ... they seem like a disaster to read, at least for me... it's all Is and Vs

10.28.18  12:32 am   what's you're favorite nightmare?

     cold hard professionalism

10.28.18  12:18 am   how can i stop being upset?

      how did you start

10.27.18  11:53 pm   What do you think?

     darkness is actually very bright

10.27.18  11:52 pm   if you had to pick a nonmusical trade, what would it be?

     diplomat

10.27.18  11:40 pm   I love your songs. What motivates you to make them?

     the possible love you may have for them if i make them

10.27.18  10:26 pm   My art sucks so now I hate myself and I don't know what to do it hurts 

     ah, you may be pleased to know scientists have discovered bad art is very good

10.27.18  9:42 pm   If you ever had the opportunity, would you perform your songs live?

     yes
